trends: There have been no other sightings in Altadena
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailswas lying on my lounger just looking up at the migrating condors catching the up-drafts (saw about 27 in various groups) when i caught a glimpse of an object moving behind the tree tops at what appeared to be a great altitude. it was drifting like a white party balloon - until it stopped and remained motionless for about 10 mins. it shone like a star in the sky - but this was mid afternoon on a sunny and clear day with a deep blue sky. i had time call the wife and kids to come out and see it. looked at it thru binoculars - then i decided to get the camera; by the time i came back it was no longer visible\there.
Summary: Star like in the middle of an clear sunny day in LA
